suggestedNewContent.title: The spacing Property (Flutter 3.27+)
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Introduce the new spacing property that eliminates the need for SizedBox between children. Show: Column(spacing: 16, children: [...]). Compare before/after code. Note: This is now the preferred approach for uniform spacing.

suggestedNewContent.title: Flexible vs Expanded vs Spacer
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Comparison table showing: Expanded (takes ALL remaining space, forces child to fill), Flexible (takes space proportionally, child can be smaller), Spacer (empty flexible space for pushing widgets apart). Include code examples for each.

suggestedNewContent.title: mainAxisSize - Controlling Widget Size
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Explain MainAxisSize.max (default - Column takes full height) vs MainAxisSize.min (Column shrinks to fit children). Critical for dialogs, cards, and nested layouts.

suggestedNewContent.title: Understanding Overflow Errors
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Explain the yellow/black overflow stripes, why they happen (unbounded constraints), and three solutions: 1) Wrap in Expanded/Flexible, 2) Use SingleChildScrollView, 3) Use ListView for long lists. Include visual diagram.

suggestedNewContent.title: Basic Column Example
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Complete runnable example showing a Column with three Text widgets, demonstrating default alignment behavior. Include MaterialApp scaffold wrapper for context.

suggestedNewContent.title: Basic Row Example
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Complete runnable example showing a Row with three Icon widgets, demonstrating horizontal layout. Show how mainAxisAlignment affects icon positioning.

suggestedNewContent.title: When to Use ListView vs Column
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Decision guide: Use Column for small, fixed number of widgets. Use ListView.builder for many/dynamic items (better performance). Use SingleChildScrollView + Column for forms or mixed content that might overflow.

summary: The lesson covers fundamental Column and Row concepts but has notable gaps. The biggest issues are: 1) Missing the new Flutter 3.27 'spacing' property which significantly simplifies child spacing, 2) Incomplete coverage of Flexible vs Expanded vs Spacer, 3) Shallow treatment of common mistakes without showing problem code and solutions, 4) Missing mainAxisSize explanation which is critical for nested layouts. The lesson would benefit from more complete runnable examples and a troubleshooting guide for overflow errors. The challenge is good but hints and common mistakes need to be more relevant to layout concepts.
